name: Adult Black Dragon Lich
movement: walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.
description: The Adult Black Dragon Lich combines the menacing presence of a dragon with the dark magic of undeath. Its body is an amalgamation of draconic grandeur and the eerie essence of a lich, featuring scales that shimmer with an ominous shade of black.
memorable: It is a tactical presence on the battlefield with the capability to manipulate its surroundings using spells and its unique abilities.
goals: To exert control over the battlefield, potentially seeking revenge or power through its undead existence.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other undead creatures or as a servant to dark and powerful entities.
environment: Typically found in ancient ruins, dark lairs, or hidden water bodies that cater to its Ambusher ability.
strengths: High damage immunities to acid, necrotic, and poison, alongside strong saving throws, make it a resilient foe.
weaknesses: Susceptibility to radiant damage common among undead.
attacks: Employs a mix of physical damage from its bites and claws, alongside powerful acid damage from its spit and breath.
most_powerful_ability: Acid Breath attack causing significant area damage alongside a blinding effect, amplifying its lethal threat.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a remarkable passive Perception score of 20, making it difficult to evade.
skills: Well-versed in stealth, history, and perception, enhancing its versatility in various scenarios.
additional_information: Can create a sphere of magical darkness that normal vision cannot penetrate.
Utilizes terrifying roars to frighten its enemies.
Has an advantage on Stealth checks while submerged in water.
Ability to cast spells innately without material components like animate dead and fog cloud.
Grapples targets while dealing damage with its bite attack.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with access to spells such as animate dead and fog cloud, using Charisma as its spellcasting ability.
